channel.title: Multiple Bloodlines?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Multiple Bloodlines?"

item.title: Re: Multiple Bloodlines?
item.content:encoded: Just check out http://bvs.wikidot.com/bloodline for more info on bloodlines!

item.title: Re: Multiple Bloodlines?
item.content:encoded: for season 2+ jonin ascencion i need 3 bloodtypes and i only have legacy how do i get blood of the reaper and any onther one except the trade??

item.title: Re: Multiple Bloodlines?
item.content:encoded: on top of this, at higher lvl mission some loopable items are given to you only when you use certain bloodlines.

item.title: Re: Multiple Bloodlines?
item.content:encoded: You cannot get RedEye, WhiteEye, and Legacy of the Hero -sometimes called the "innate Bloodlines"- at the same time. However, each time you loop you have the opportunity to change your innate bloodline: give up the one you'd been using and try another. It is generally a good idea to spend each of your first three seasons with a different innate bloodline.

item.title: Re: Multiple Bloodlines?
item.content:encoded: You can only get 1 of the bloodlines per season, you cannot have redeye, whiteye, and legacy all at once.

item.title: Re: Multiple Bloodlines?
item.content:encoded: You can only have 1 of the starting 3 bloodlines each season. So no, it is not possible to get all three of the base bloodlines in the same season.

item.title: Multiple Bloodlines?
item.content:encoded: now i'm aware that you can get bloodlines such as Blood of the Reaper, etc. is it possible to be able to acquire RedEye, WhiteEye, and Legacy of the Hero?
